title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: WAT Support for English Vocabulary Learning for Visually Impaired Students

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English vocabulary and sentence structures, experience with web-based assistive technologies
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: In a VR simulation environment, learners can accurately acquire the spelling and meaning of over 50 intermediate-level English words using WAT (Word Acquisition Training).
Through web-based assistive technology, learners can apply at least three English vocabulary learning strategies that combine auditory and tactile feedback.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in English spelling and over 85% comprehension of word meanings through summative assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
